thread.title: Honeymoon
thread.title_full: Honeymoon - Review of Roger Smith Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: jason337
title: Honeymoon
text:
Had the most amazing time at the Roger. The hotel and service are relaxed and friendly, so so friendly for New York, its a real experience staying at the Roger you feel like you have your own apartment in New York for a brief time. Thank you to all the staff for making our Honeymoon great.
Room Tip: Free yogurt in the reception, believe me it could be better. See more room tips
